### QC checks {.tabset}
#### Summary {.tabset}
The table below documents Quality Control checks performed on VIBI-related wetland data, along with number of records returned on each check. If any records were returned for a given check, the row is highlighted yellow in the table, and a separate tab corresponding to that check will appear within its associated Data Tab. 
```{r}
QC_check_table
```
